name: Food For Your Thoughts
description:
Have you ever gone to the store and somehow managed to lose your shopping list along the way? Well, that's exactly what this short game is about; trying to remember what you needed!

Place the right items in the correct order to win!

Made by:

- Holly Lowe

- Catriona Barclay

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
